name: mystery_lunch_cli
description: A command line interface to plan mystery lunches. The user registers events and particpants through the command line. Then a concrete lunch is created by randomly forming groups from all the particopants. Why a mystery lunch? To initiate talking and knoweledge exchange with colleagues you ever wanted to go and eat out with, but out of habit never ask.

scripts.test:
mocha test/command_line_interpreter_spec.js
mocha test/command_handler_spec.js
mocha test/interface_object_spec.js
mocha test/context_object_spec.js
mocha test/mystery_lunch_iob_spec.js
